text: The Cossacks () is a 1961 Soviet drama movie directed by Vasili Pronin.Прощание с Зинаидой Кириенко пройдет в Доме киноКазаки It stars Leonid Gubanov, Boris Andreyev, and Zinaida Kiriyenko. ==Actors== * Leonid Gubanov - Dmitri Olenin * Boris Andreyev - Eroshka * Zinaida Kiriyenko - Maryana * Eduard Bredun - Lukashka * Boris Novikov - Nazarka * Vera Yenyutina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1961 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vasili Pronin Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Cossacks (1961 movie)
